text: As part of @MassGeneralNews #MGHBlackHistoryMonth programming this upcoming week @MGHEquity @mghcdi & @MGHRadDiversity are cohosting this panel addressing #COVID19 impact on our Black communities & ways to mitigate  #vaccine hesitancy.
